commit message:
Bump to version 3.0 beta9 (43)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fast ping mechanism for checking broken connections

Test connection when opening conversation every 5 minutes

Desperate measures...

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Send ping test after entering active state

After sending CSI active state indication packet, send
a ping if there were no stanza received before 3 seconds
from sending <active/>.

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix server list retrieval (fix #330)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Use delete intent for notifications (close #322)

On delete intent will mark all threads as old, so the next time
Kontalk starts, notification will not be fired again for old
messages.
